name: LFG2G
description:
LFG2G is part of the I WON’T BE HANGING OUT ANYMORE (IWBHOA) series 

IWBHOA is the inaugural audiovisual series from House of The Model:
Korgkills
Drumr
iScream20
Twin Keys
LFG2G
Subuz

each OBJKT in this series has a unique piece of music from “I Won’t Be Hanging Out Anymore” by The Model

each OBJKT is designed to stand alone, or to be “played” with other OBJKTS to remix the song or create a new one

AUDIO
Korg Monophonic Synthesizer MS-20
Yamaha CS01
percussion sounds arranged in Logic Pro
analog effects and mixing console 
Shadow Hills Mastering Compressors and Oxford Limiters

VISUALS
integrate parts of the original album artwork from the album Physical, other mixed media illustrations, photography, and digital recordings
processed with Adobe After Effects and HandBrake

COMPOSABILITY
among other things, the creators of these OBJKTS consider them to be completely composable
they are building blocks for fun, play, innovation, collaboration, relationships
therefore, token holders are encouraged to use the audio and visual material, if interested, in their own creative efforts and projects (i.e., non-exclusive license for personal and commercial use)

SALES
shared equally among all members of the House of The Model
a portion of sales and royalties from the IWBHOA series will go to The Marshall Project, a nonprofit news organization covering the U.S. criminal justice system

@HouseofTheModel
